data.what_is:
Kevy helps online businesses increase sales through intelligent, personalised marketing campaigns.

This is made possible through a combination of marketing automation, predictive analytics, and artificial intelligence tools.

Marketing automation can be complex, so Kevy's team also provides support to help you solve issues and build optimal campaigns.
data.product_description: Kevy's plug-and-play Cloud Connectors make it fast and easy to integrate and sync your cloud apps in less than 10 minutes, without writing a single line of code.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kevy?
It gives you a uniqe experience of shopping

What do you dislike about Kevy?
It should contain more store contents to see more choices.

What problems is Kevy solving and how is that benefiting you?
It facilitates the comparison of prices.

initial_reviews.review_title: Kevy helps their customers to grow
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kevy?
I really like that they care about their customers, Kevy helps every customer to grow their business.

What do you dislike about Kevy?
I don't have complains about using this platform.

What problems is Kevy solving and how is that benefiting you?
The platform helps me when I have segmentation problems and it makes easier the way I connect with the customers.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Kevy solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: The platform helps me when I have segmentation problems and it makes easier the way I connect with the customers.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kevy?
What I like most is that allow you to send targeted emails based on customer interests and actions.

What do you dislike about Kevy?
While the initial plans may appear budget-friendly for small businesses, expenses can quickly escalate as your email list expands.

What problems is Kevy solving and how is that benefiting you?
I really like that reach customers directly on their mobile devices with timely offers and reminders.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Kevy solving and how is that benefiting you?

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kevy?
Ease of use with lots of advanced features. Excellent support and very cheap compared to competitors.

What do you dislike about Kevy?
The interface sometimes lags a little. But not 100% of the time.

What problems is Kevy solving and how is that benefiting you?
Email
